name: CurbsideMotion
summary: Curbside ARRIVE SDK addon that adds motion activity
description:
Add CurbsideMotion if your app supports motion and you want Curbside to track whether the user is walking, running, in a vehicle, or stationary.

You can safely add CurbsideMotion to devices without motion. In those cases, it will be noop.

https://developer.curbside.com
